title: Record 43-year sentence for insulting Thai monarchy sends a chilling message to activists
content:
1. Record 43-year sentence for insulting Thai monarchy sends a chilling message to activists  CNN
  2. Thai woman jailed for record 43 years for criticising monarchy  BBC News
  3. Woman gets record 43-year prison sentence for insulting Thai king: "I thought it was nothing"  CBS News
  4. Court in Thailand Sentences Woman to 43 Years for Criticizing Monarchy  The New York Times
  5. A former civil servant has been sentenced to 43 years in prison for insulting the Thai monarchy  Yahoo News

localize.title: 侮辱泰国君主制获刑43年的记录向活动人士发出了一个令人不寒而栗的信息。
侮辱泰國君主制獲刑43年的記錄向活動人士發出了一個令人不寒而慄的信息。
